Methods in com.sun.enterprise.component that throw ComponentException
 void ComponentManager.extract(java.lang.Object component, java.util.logging.Logger logger)
          Extracts resources identified with Provides annotation and store them using the resource manager instance
 void ComponentManager.inject(java.lang.Object component, java.util.logging.Logger logger)
          Injects all resources identified with Requires annotation, throw a CompomentException if a resource cannot be injected (like there is no instance of that contract available to inject).

Methods in com.sun.enterprise.dependency that throw ComponentException
<T> java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends T>>
DependencyResolver.resolve(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Class<? extends T>> _services)
          Resolves a list of services implementation by ordering them so the inner dependencies of such services (service A needs the output of service B) are satisfied.
<T> java.util.List<? extends T>
DependencyResolver.resolveAndInstantiate(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Class<? extends T>> _services, java.util.logging.Logger logger)
          Resolves (reoder the list of services so the dependencies are fully satisfied) and instantiate each component using the resolved order.
